ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:15}); // {Cloud}
“Can you let me borrow this?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:23}); // Dio
“Heh, heh, heh.
Nothing all
that difficult.”{PAUSE}“This is the Battle Arena.
Show me your fighting skills.
Just you, boy.
I'm expecting a good fight!”
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:8, type:2, adjust:0});

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:21}); // Dio
“I see…
Then let's pretend that this
never happened.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:12}); // Dio
“Heh, heh, heh.
Long time no see, boy.
Hmm? You like that, huh?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:13}); // Dio
“I got it from the guy in
a little shack south
of here, past the 'River'.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:14}); // Dio
“If you want to know more,
go there and talk to him.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:16}); // Dio
“Heh, heh, heh.
Sorry, but it's not for rent.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:17}); // Dio
“Hmm.”{PAUSE}“Since you've been good to me in
the past, I CAN let you have
it on one condition.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:23}); // Dio
“Heh, heh, heh.
Nothing all
that difficult.”{PAUSE}“This is the Battle Arena.
Show me your fighting skills.
Just you, boy.
I'm expecting a good fight!”
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:8, type:2, adjust:0});

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:21}); // Dio
“I see…
Then let's pretend that this
never happened.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:25}); // Dio
“That's the best you could do?
Well, a promise is a promise.
Go ahead, take it.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:26}); // Dio
“Hmm, you did pretty well,
young man!{PAUSE}“Good, it's a promise,
so go ahead and take it.
I'll give this to you too.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:27}); // Dio
“Heh, heh, heh!
Well done, young man!
And, as I promised,{PAUSE}“you can take it.
Oh, and I'll give you this too.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:31}); // Dio
“We shall meet again!
Heh, heh, heh.”

dialogStrings:
Dio
“Heh, heh, heh.
Long time no see, boy.
Hmm? You like that, huh?”

Dio
“I got it from the guy in
a little shack south
of here, past the 'River'.”

Dio
“If you want to know more,
go there and talk to him.”

Dio
“Heh, heh, heh.
Sorry, but it's not for rent.”

Dio
“Hmm.”{PAUSE}“Since you've been good to me in
the past, I CAN let you have
it on one condition.”

Dio
“Heh, heh, heh.
Entertain me!”{PAUSE}{CHOICE}What do I gotta do?
{CHOICE}Not in the mood.

Dio
“I see…
Then let's pretend that this
never happened.”

Dio
“Heh, heh, heh! So!
You want the Keystone, right?
How 'bout entertaining me first?”{PAUSE}{CHOICE}What do I gotta do?
{CHOICE}Not in the mood.

Dio
“Heh, heh, heh.
Nothing all
that difficult.”{PAUSE}“This is the Battle Arena.
Show me your fighting skills.
Just you, boy.
I'm expecting a good fight!”

Dio
“That's the best you could do?
Well, a promise is a promise.
Go ahead, take it.”

Dio
“Hmm, you did pretty well,
young man!{PAUSE}“Good, it's a promise,
so go ahead and take it.
I'll give this to you too.”

Dio
“Heh, heh, heh!
Well done, young man!
And, as I promised,{PAUSE}“you can take it.
Oh, and I'll give you this too.”

Dio
“We shall meet again!
Heh, heh, heh.”

{Aeris}
“With this,
We can get into the
Temple of the Ancients.
Let's go, {Cloud}!”

{Tifa}
“With this Key Materia,
We can get in to the
Temple of the Ancients.
Let's go, {Cloud}!”

{Barret}
“This'll get us into the
Temple of the Ancients, right?”
